HostNamaste – OpenVZ VPS from $10/Year and KVM VPS from $15/year in France, Europe and Quebec, Canada!

dallas, france, hostnamaste, jacksonville, kvm, los angeles, openvz, quebec December 19, 2020 @ 12:16 am, by raindog308

HostNamaste has returned with some end-of-year specials for LowEndBox readers.  This is the eighth time we’ve had them on in 2020 and they’ve always delivered great value in their offers.

This time is no exception:

  • OpenVZ VPSes starting at $10/year
  • KVMs starting at $15/year
  • Both in North American and European locations

HostNamaste is a registered business in the state of Rajkot, Gujarat, India and currently accept PayPal, Credit/Debit, Alipay, WebMoney, Payoneer, Wallets and other payment methods. If you are interested check out their TOS/Legal Docs and their AUP.

If you’ve tried HostNamaste in the past or decide to try out one of these offers, please comment below to let the LEB community know how it goes.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“HostNamaste is a company that was started in March 2016 and has continued to offer hosting ever since. We are focused primarily in the LowEnd market, but it is our philosophy to provide quality services while within the LowEnd market’s price range. While this is certainly the goal of many LowEnd hosting companies, we have been quietly providing our services for nearly 4 years with no complaints or issues whatsoever. We are particularly proud to offer many features that cannot often be offered by many LowEnd companies, including 24/7/365 Support, a 07-day money back guarantee, RAID-10 disks and dual processor nodes.”

Now read more to see the offers!
